content:
<rule id="3rd-party-30200" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <or>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="rocketmq-client" groupId="org.apache.rocketmq"/>
                    </project>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="rocketmq-acl" groupId="org.apache.rocketmq"/>
                    </project>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-cloud-starter-stream-rocketmq" groupId="com.alibaba.cloud"/>
                    </project>
                    <project>
                        <artifact artifactId="spring-cloud-starter-bus-rocketmq" groupId="com.alibaba.cloud"/>
                  </project>
                </or>              
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Rocket MQ">
                    <description>The application embeds the Rocket MQ framework.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Rocket MQ</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
